body.title: Get in Touch
body.description: Have questions or need assistance with OpenObserve? We're here to help you get the most out of your observability platform.

options.title: Join our Slack Community
options.description: Connect with other OpenObserve users, get help, and share your experiences in our active Slack community.

options.title: GitHub Discussions
options.description: Ask questions, report issues, and contribute to the development of OpenObserve through GitHub Discussions.
